name: (Index)
content:
Hopefully you are able to find all the rules you need within. Most rules can also be found by simply searching for their relevant name in the compendium search bar or by using modules such as Quick Insert. If you find rules are missing entirely, or would like some included, please let me know. (Discord: fadedshadow589#8270)

The primary categories for rules are laid out below, with sub-headings contained within their respective area.

Note: Optional Rules are missing besides Hero Points, Kingdom Building, and Words of Power, and Gamemastery is not currently included.
